description:
Scuba Diving is an exciting and adventurous activity, that allows us to explore the underwater enviroment.

Efficient and capable divers can minimize the risk through proper and innovative training. Dive Explorer Foundation (DEF), an IDREO affiliate, has create a single and unique Dive Explorer Course using the latest scuba diving techniques and technology available today, based on decades of worldwide dive training.

The goal is to become and independent Dive Explorer in any open water enviroment, in a single thorough course. DEF is filling the gap for boat owners, who wish to add diving in their adventures, specially due unique and simple sidemount equipment configuration.

This is not a "tourist course" for a quick dive upon holidays, this is a lifetime passion based in understanding the latest techniques and procedures to enjoy exploring the underwater realm.
title: Scuba Explorer Course
instructors: Nick Toussaint,  Virgilio Moreno, HÃ¥kan Gustafsson
